name: application(_:handleActionWithIdentifier:forRemoteNotification:completionHandler:)
desc: Tells the app delegate to perform the custom action specified by a remote notification.DeprecatedUse userNotificationCenter(_:didReceive:withCompletionHandler:) instead.
declaration:
optional func application(_ application: UIApplication, 
handleActionWithIdentifier identifier: String?, 
    forRemoteNotification userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any], 
        completionHandler: @escaping () -> Void)
